ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily, You have always watched over us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You are Well Aware of our situation."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, You are ever seeing us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Thou art ever Seeing us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You are surely watching over us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Thou! Thou art of us ever a Beholder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For Thou art He that (ever) regardeth us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! You are of us Ever a Well-Seer."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You are always watching over us.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, You are of us ever Seeing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:35] Indeed You are ever Seeing of us’, ever Knowing, having been gracious [to us] by way of [appointing us to deliver] the Message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Thou art ever Seeing us) You have knowledge of us.
